price: Na najikinga kwako, Mola wangu Mlezi, wasinikaribie.
footnotes: Na ewe Mola Mlezi! Najilinda kwako wasiwe nami katika kitendo chochote ili kitendo hicho kiwe kimetakasika, safi, kwa ajili ya ridhaa yako tukufu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
